quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk
quotes.quote: If a tree falls in the forest and nobody is there to hear it, doesn't it just lie there and rot?

quotes.author: Lao Tzu
quotes.quote: If lightning is the anger of the gods, then the gods are concerned mostly about trees.

quotes.author: e. e. cummings
quotes.quote:
a wind has blown the rain away and blown
the sky away and all the leaves away,
and the trees stand. I think i too have known
autumn too long

quotes.author: Hermann Hesse
quotes.quote:
Oh oak tree, how they have pruned you.
Now you stand odd and strangely shaped!
You were hacked a hundred times until
you had nothing left but spite and will!

quotes.author: Sarah Kay
quotes.quote:
In New York, when a tree dies, nobody mourns that
it was cut down in its prime. Nobody counts the rings,
notifies the loved ones. There are other trees.
We can always squeeze in one more. Mind the tourists.

quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau
quotes.quote: If a man walks in the woods for love of them half of each day, he is in danger of being regarded as a loafer. But if he spends his days as a speculator, shearing off those woods and making the earth bald before her time, he is deemed an industrious and enterprising citizen.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: The wonder is that we can see these trees and not wonder more.

quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quotes.quote: I am a forest, and a night of dark trees: but he who is not afraid of my darkness, will find banks full of roses under my cypresses.

quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton
quotes.quote: Just at present you only see the tree by the light of the lamp. I wonder when you would ever see the lamp by the light of the tree.

quotes.author: Virginia Woolf
quotes.quote:
And all the lives we ever lived
and all the lives to be,
are full of trees and changing leaves.
